item.title: Garlic Bulbils as a Treat for Chickens
item.description:
Dateline: 21 August 2016 AD Small garlic bulb seeds, known as bulbils, grow on the garlic scapes. While I typically remove the scapes early, this year I let them grow and produce bulbils. I wondered if my chickens would enjoy the strong-tasting bulbils and tossed some into their feed. They were hesitant at first but ended up consuming them. Researching online, I discovered that many people provide crushed garlic to their chickens for health reasons, right from when they are chicks...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/garlic-bulbils-as-a-treat-for-chickens/
